attributes.description:
2013 Mercedes Benz E500 Coupe AMG, full service history, low mileage only 102 800 km’s, selling for R 369 950.00, truly immaculate condition. 
This is the last of the last I’m proud to present to you the very rare E500 Coupe AMG, all I can say is WOW what an amazing vehicle. 
This is a very special car to me, I have always been in love with the E500 Coupe AMG line, and I think it’s one of the best cars I’ve had the pleasure of driving on the rare occasions when we do manage to find clean ones like this, you simply cannot help but enjoy this car every time you get inside and start the engine 
To say this car is well kept and looked after would be the understatement of the century, this car is one in a million. How gorgeous does this vehicle look with the AMG pack on, she comes fully loaded with every lots of nice extras.
WHY IS THIS CAR SPECIAL? 
•	Full AMG pack
•	Panoramic sliding roof
•	AMG body styling
•	AMG lowered suspension
•	AMG alloy rims
•	Reverse camera
•	Satellite navigation
•	Paddle shift
•	Tow bar 
•	Still has original medical kit intact
•	Rear seats look like they have hardly been sat in
•	Still has that beautiful Mercedes Benz interior smell
•	The V8 roar following you in every gear
•	The 500 part is really what makes this car special, they are hard to find and for good reason

attributes.description: This Elegant Crossover Has Excellent Passenger Space And Makes A Perfect Family Vehicle. Features Include Xenon Lights, Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Bluetooth, CD Player, Auxiliary Input, Air Conditioner, Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint, Roofrack, Electric Tailgate, Towbar And 17 Inch Alloy Wheels. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted.
